sentences.sContent: Since innovation throws open, the course of Urbanization develops rapidly, the visage of city changes with each passing day, demotic standard of living is improved notability.
sentences.sContent_eng: Since innovation throws open, the course of Urbanization develops rapidly, the visage of city changes with each passing day, demotic standard of living is improved notability.
sentences.sCn: 改革开放以来，我国城市化进程得到了迅速发展，城市面貌日新月异，人民的生活水平得到了显著改善。

words.tran: 值得注意的，显著的；著名的
著名的；显著的；附有乐谱的
注意；记下（note的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tranOther: the state or quality of being notable
